name: Read the content of stories and with field comments

steps.name: Given I set up a "GET" request to "/projects/{proj_id}/stories" endpoint
And I configure the "fields" with the values "comments(:default,file_attachments(:default,uploader))"
And I configure the "with_state" with the values "unscheduled"
Then I get a "200" status code as response
And I verify all stories_with_filters schema

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Acceptance tests for stories with create and read
